summary.label:
The BOV 3D Secure app is downloadable to smart devices and will enable the user to effect online purchases with a Bank of Valletta debit or credit card. 

The app is simple to use:

The first step is to download the BOV 3D Secure app and install it on your smart device
You will then need to enrol the Bank of Valletta debit or credit card that you will use to effect online purchases. This is a one time process since once you enrol one card all your Bank of Valletta cards, that may be used for online purchases will be automatically enrolled to the 3D Secure app.
During the enrolment process you will set an authentication passcode that will be used to authenticate you online purchases via the app - alternatively you can choose to set up biometric authentication by means of fingerprint, if your device supports the feature.  

Once the one-time enrolment process is complete, you are set to start shopping online:

When checking out purchases over a certain amount, at certain merchants, the payment screen will ask you to authenticate the purchase;  
Simultaneously you will receive a push notification on your smart device which will prompt you to access the BOV 3D Secure app to authenticate the transaction either by passcode (established during enrollment) or biometrically, by means of your fingerprint. 
The app will then advise that authentication is successful and you will be able to tap the "proceed" button on the payment screen to complete your purchase.
If you are in an area of no reception, or your device is not connected to an internet/data service, the payment screen will prompt you to scan a QR Code which will automatically launch the BOV 3D Secure app on your phone and following authentication a 6 digit code will be displayed. This code is to be inserted in the designated field on the payment screen. Following that simply tap the "proceed" button on the payment screen to complete your purchase.

Important information
Bank of Valletta will not contact you because you are using the app. So please stay alert to emails, text messages or phone calls that appear to be from us. Criminals may try to trick you into giving them sensitive personal or account information.  Any suspicious communications or transactions should always be reported to Bank of Valletta immediately by calling the number on the reverse of your card, thus enabling immediate remedial action to be taken as necessary.

title.label: BOV 3D Secure - Bank of Valletta p.l.c.

summary.label:
Quanloop is a financial business group dedicated to wholesale funding. We attract capital from investors like you and act as the primary source of funding for our commercial finance intermediary partners, such as leasing or factoring companies, crowdfunding platforms, etc.

This is our official app covering most of the functionality of the website.

FEATURES
• Signing up
• Profile verification
• Top-up investing budget
• Withdraw money
• Set up your portfolio
• Watch insights
• Earn back the inflation loss
• Log in to the desktop version with mobile

We borrow €1 from you for 24h, pool it with other investors' money and lend it to our partners. We repay you the debt at midnight in your platform account. From then on, you are either free to stay and continue investing or withdraw if you wish.

Every day, our partners source capital from Quanloop by introducing projects (loans, assets, etc.) they wish to finance. Following a strict filtering programme, we accept the projects for wholesale funding and prepare to pool funds from our investors.

Quanloop uses the projects it finances as security for the money it borrows from you and other investors. To avoid complicated legal frameworks for collateral management, the fund promises its whole capital to investors through the platform, ensuring that every single Euro you contribute is protected by a large portfolio managed by us.

Put simply, you create an account on the website and set up your portfolio, choosing the most appropriate risk level and the corresponding interest rate and make an offer to invest. Every midnight, your money offering is tested against the capital demand and invested for 24 hours.

Each time money is used to finance a project, we add an underwriting reserve of our own money. That adds an extra liquidity layer to avoid you being unable to exit the next day. Although it should be impossible, in case we lack liquid funds to refinance your Euro, you earn an extra 2% for staying longer.

Quanloop is a great alternative to a piggy bank deposit, being able to add over 15% annual profit to your money.

title.label: Quanloop - Quanloop

Want to know more?
Log on quickly and securely
Face ID and Touch ID mean you can use your face or fingerprint to quickly log on to the HSBC UK Mobile Banking app, without having to enter a password.

Toutes les transactions distributeurs sont disponibles sur l’application à savoir le dépôt vers les comptes clients, le retrait depuis les comptes clients et sou-comptes salaires et réception internationale, le retrait avec code,  le transfert vers un autre distributeur, la vente de crédit téléphonique et le paiement de facture pour le client.
Il lui donne aussi la possibilité de pouvoir débloquer et réinitialiser son compte en cas de blocage ou d’oubli du code en saisissant ses numéros de RCCM et Carte d’identité en ayant directement accès au formulaire pour le retour des fonds.
 
Quelques définitions :
Distributeur : personne physique ou morale inscrite au Registre du Commerce et du Crédit Mobilier, signataire du présent Contrat et agréée par OFMS au titre des présentes pour effectuer les opérations pour les clients.
Dépôt : toute opération du distributeur visant à recharger son Compte Orange Money en UV
Retrait : consiste à retirer des UV du compte Orange Money du client en échange d’argent liquide
Transfert : Consiste à l’envoi de monnaie électronique entre 2 distributeurs
Historique : Consiste à afficher sur menu le journal des transactions effectuées depuis le compte du distributeur avec possibilité de donner les détails (montant, date, heure, numéro client etc…)
Transfert : Consiste à l’envoi de monnaie électronique entre 2 distributeurs 
Transaction : désigne toute opération (dépôt, retrait, opération de paiement ou transfert d’argent) réalisée en utilisant le Service Orange Money
Vente de crédit : Consiste au rechargement de crédit téléphonique du compte de l’utilisateur par le distributeur
UV : unité de valeur représentative de monnaie électronique

Taraftar token’la kulüp kararlarında söz hakkı
Galatasaray, Trabzonspor, Barcelona, Juventus, Paris Saint-Germain, Milan, Roma, Atletico Madrid’in resmi taraftar token’larıyla dünya futbolunda söz sahibi olun. 



Yüksek performans, hızlı altyapı
Global standartları belirleyen işlem hizmetinden faydalanın, piyasa hareketliliğinin yüksek olduğu zamanlarda dahi işlemlerinizi hızla yapın.



7/24 Türk Lirası yatırma ve çekme olanağı
Akbank, Ziraat Bankası, Yapı Kredi Bankası, Vakıfbank ve Fibabanka ile 7/24 Türk Lirası yatırma ve çekme işlemi yapabilir, diğer bankalar üzerinden yapacağınız EFT işlemlerini banka mesai saatleri içinde gerçekleştirebilirsiniz. Türkiye’nin güvenilir finans kurumları ile Bitcoin ve diğer kripto para işlemlerinizi kolaylıkla yapın.



TL yatırmada limit yok
Paribu’da TL yatırma işlemlerinde alt limit bulunmamaktadır.



Veri ve varlıklarınız güvende
Paribu’da kullanıcı varlıkları güvenliği sağlanmış soğuk cüzdanlarda muhafaza edilir. Daima güncel güvenlik tedbirleriyle işlemlerinizi güvenle yapabilirsiniz.



Avantajlı komisyon oranları
Kullanıcının işlem hacmi arttıkça 10 binde 1’e kadar azalan komisyon oranları uygulayan Paribu’nun avantajlı komisyon oranlarından yararlanın.



7/24 hızlı ve kesintisiz destek
Paribu’nun alanında uzman ve tecrübeli Destek Birimi’ne Paribu web sitesinin alt kısmındaki “Destek İste” bölümünden ya da Paribu uygulamasındaki "Destek" bölümünden 7/24 ulaşın.



Paribu Alarm sizin için takipte
Alarm özelliğiyle seçtiğiniz kripto para belirlediğiniz fiyata ulaştığında haberdar olun.



Stop-loss ile bir adım önde olun
Bir kripto para belirlediğiniz fiyata ulaştığında otomatik emrin devreye girmesi için stop-loss özelliğini kullanın.



Fiyat performansını anlık izleyin
Seçtiğiniz kripto paranın fiyat performansını grafikler üzerinden inceleyin.



Widget ekleyin, güncel fiyatları anlık görün
Telefonunuza widget ekleyerek güncel fiyatların ekranınızda anlık olarak görüntülenmesini sağlayın.



Favorilere ekleyin, kolayca izleyin
İstediğiniz sayıda kripto parayı favorilerinize ekleyin, kolaylıkla takip edin.



Piyasayı şeffaflıkla takip edin
Paribu’da tüm işlem hacimleri gerçek verileri gösterir. “Market Geçmişi” bölümünden tüm işlemleri anlık ve anonim olarak inceleyin.
Tüm soru ve destek talepleriniz için Paribu web sitesinin alt kısmındaki “Destek İste” ya da Paribu uygulamasındaki "Destek" bölümünden Destek Birimimize 7/24 ulaşabilirsiniz.
